verses.verse: And king <S%H4428><s%> Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josiah <S%H2977><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> instead <S%H8478><s%> of Coniah <S%H3659><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoiakim, <S%H3079><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> made king <S%H4427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

But neither <S%H3808><s%> he, <S%H1931><s%> nor his servants, <S%H5650><s%> nor the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> did hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he spoke <S%H1696><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> Jeremiah. <S%H3414><s%>

And Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jehucal <S%H3081><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shelemiah <S%H8018><s%> and Zephaniah <S%H6846><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Maaseiah <S%H4641><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Pray <S%H6419><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> for <S%H1157><s%> us.

Now Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> came in <S%H935><s%> and went out <S%H3318><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the people: <S%H5971><s%> for they had not <S%H3808><s%> put <S%H5414><s%> him into prison. <S%H1004><s%> <S%H3628><s%>

Then Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> army <S%H2428><s%> was come forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> and when the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%> that besieged <S%H6696><s%> <S%H5921><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> tidings <S%H8088><s%> of them, they departed <S%H5927><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>
Then came <S%H1961><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%> Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> shall ye say <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> that sent <S%H7971><s%> you unto <S%H413><s%> me to inquire <S%H1875><s%> of me; Behold, <S%H2009><s%> Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> army, <S%H2428><s%> which is come forth <S%H3318><s%> to help <S%H5833><s%> you, shall return <S%H7725><s%> to Egypt <S%H4714><s%> into their own land. <S%H776><s%>

And the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%> shall come again, <S%H7725><s%> and fight <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> and take <S%H3920><s%> it, and burn <S%H8313><s%> it with fire. <S%H784><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> Deceive <S%H5377><s%> not <S%H408><s%> yourselves, <S%H5315><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> The Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%> shall surely depart <S%H1980><s%> <S%H1980><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> us: for <S%H3588><s%> they shall not <S%H3808><s%> depart. <S%H1980><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> though <S%H518><s%> ye had smitten <S%H5221><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> army <S%H2428><s%> of the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%> that fight <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H854><s%> you, and there remained <S%H7604><s%> but wounded <S%H1856><s%> men <S%H376><s%> among them, yet should they rise <S%H6965><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> in his tent, <S%H168><s%> and burn <S%H8313><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> that when the army <S%H2428><s%> of the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%> was broken up <S%H5927><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> for fear <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%> army, <S%H2428><s%>

Then Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> went forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Jerusalem <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3389><s%> to go <S%H1980><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> to separate himself <S%H2505><s%> thence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8033><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the people. <S%H5971><s%>

And when he <S%H1931><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> in the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> a captain <S%H1167><s%> of the ward <S%H6488><s%> was there, <S%H8033><s%> whose name <S%H8034><s%> was Irijah, <S%H3376><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shelemiah, <S%H8018><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hananiah; <S%H2608><s%> and he took <S%H8610><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Thou <S%H859><s%> fallest away <S%H5307><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the Chaldeans. <S%H3778><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> It is false; <S%H8267><s%> I fall <S%H5307><s%> not <S%H369><s%> away to <S%H5921><s%> the Chaldeans. <S%H3778><s%> But he hearkened <S%H8085><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> to <S%H413><s%> him: so Irijah <S%H3376><s%> took <S%H8610><s%> Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> him to <S%H413><s%> the princes. <S%H8269><s%>

Wherefore the princes <S%H8269><s%> were wroth <S%H7107><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> Jeremiah, <S%H3414><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> him, and put <S%H5414><s%> him in prison <S%H1004><s%> <S%H612><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> the scribe: <S%H5608><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they had made <S%H6213><s%> that the prison. <S%H1004><s%> <S%H3608><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> was entered <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the dungeon, <S%H1004><s%> <S%H953><s%> and into <S%H413><s%> the cabins, <S%H2588><s%> and Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> had remained <S%H3427><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%>

Then Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> sent, <S%H7971><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> him out: and the king <S%H4428><s%> asked <S%H7592><s%> him secretly <S%H5643><s%> in his house, <S%H1004><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Is there <S%H3426><s%> any word <S%H1697><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the LORD? <S%H3068><s%> And Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> There is: <S%H3426><s%> for, said <S%H559><s%> he, thou shalt be delivered <S%H5414><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon. <S%H894><s%>

Moreover Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> Zedekiah, <S%H6667><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> have I offended <S%H2398><s%> against thee, or against thy servants, <S%H5650><s%> or against this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> ye have put <S%H5414><s%> me in <S%H413><s%> prison? <S%H1004><s%> <S%H3608><s%>

Where <S%H346><s%> are now your prophets <S%H5030><s%> which <S%H834><s%> prophesied <S%H5012><s%> unto you, saying, <S%H559><s%> The king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> come <S%H935><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you, nor against <S%H5921><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> land? <S%H776><s%>

Therefore hear <S%H8085><s%> now, <S%H6258><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> O my lord <S%H113><s%> the king: <S%H4428><s%> let my supplication, <S%H8467><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> be accepted <S%H5307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee; that thou cause me not <S%H408><s%> to return <S%H7725><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> the scribe, <S%H5608><s%> lest <S%H3808><s%> I die <S%H4191><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

Then Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> that they should commit <S%H6485><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> into the court <S%H2691><s%> of the prison, <S%H4307><s%> and that they should give <S%H5414><s%> him daily <S%H3117><s%> a piece <S%H3603><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%> out of the bakers' <S%H644><s%> street, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> in <S%H4480><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> were spent. <S%H8552><s%> Thus Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> remained <S%H3427><s%> in the court <S%H2691><s%> of the prison. <S%H4307><s%>
